node.text_zh:
民主派初選懶人包
🗓 7.11（六）、7.12（日）9am - 9pm，留意部份票站開放時間不同。
🏛 你可於全區任何一個票站投票，不一定到自己區議會選區投票。
1️⃣ 進入票站之前，請先安裝普及投票4.0於自己的智能電話。
2️⃣ 向工作人員展示身分證，以供驗證。
3️⃣ 向工作人員展示以下任何文件：
(a)住址證明
(b)過去的投票通知，或
(c)選舉事務處網站查證選民記錄的截圖。

投票服務站地圖（截至7月6日）
node.text_en:
🗓 7.11 (Sat), 7.12 (Sun) 9am - 9pm, some stations have different opening hours.
🏛 You can vote at any station in your LegCo 2020 district (not necessarily in your own 2019 DC Election constituency)
1️⃣ Bring your own smartphone and install Popvote 4.0 before you enter the station.
2️⃣ Present your HKID card to the station staff for verification.
3️⃣ Provide any one of the following documents to the station staff:
(a) Address proof,
(b) Past election poll card, or,
(c) Screen cap of Online Voter Information Enquiry System

Google Map (Last updated on July 6)
